post:
Hello guys,  My name is Hassan and I'm here from ReverseHosts.com to offer you a special discount on our 512MB, 1GB and 2GB RAM plans. These will be hosted in Calihops DC in San Diego, CA. These VPSs use OpenVZ and SolusVM.

  Test IP: 67.207.208.210 

[b]  San Diego, CA – VPS 512  
[/b]
 * 60GB DiskSpace
 * 1TB Bandwidth
 * 512MB RAM
 * 1024MB Burst
 * 4 vCPU Cores
 * 1 IPv4 Address
 * 100Mbps Port
 * OpenVZ/SolusVM
 * [b]PROMOCODE: LET512[/b]
 * $2.99/mo - [url="https://clients.reversehosts.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=64"]Order Link[/url]

[b]  San Diego, CA – VPS 1024 [/b] 

 * 85GB DiskSpace
 * 1.5TB Bandwidth
 * 1024MB RAM
 * 2048MB Burst
 * 4 vCPU Cores
 * 1 IPv4 Address
 * 100Mbps Port
 * OpenVZ/SolusVM
 * [b]PROMOCODE: LET1GB[/b]
 * $3.99/mo - [url="https://clients.reversehosts.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=63"]Order Link[/url]
 
   

[b]San Diego, CA – VPS 2048  [/b]

 * 100GB DiskSpace
 * 2TB Bandwidth
 * 2048MB RAM
 * 3072MB Burst
 * 4 vCPU Cores
 * 1 IPv4 Address
 * 100Mbps Port

 * [b]PROMOCODE: LET2GB[/b]
 * $4.99/mo - [url="https://clients.reversehosts.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=62"]Order Link[/url]
 
    

  We are currently having issues with Paypals IPN that we are still trying to get solved, so your VPS may take up to 2 hours to get setup, however usually they are set up in the first 10 minutes.
